channel.title: DeleteItem on command
channel.description:
how can i make it so it deletes item to get the other item
deleteItem(995)getItemSlot(995, 20000000)
i think that works but it dosnt delete it or give error if you dont have it.. it adds the item and deletes any amount you have from 1-20m
because i want to make it so if you want to get another skill cape you lose 20m or something
thanks

item.title: DeleteItem on command
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: June 09, 2007, 04:33:23 AM[/size][hr]also i added and got 72 errors, then i added } after and it compiled

but this is the code if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("strcape") && playerHasItemAmount(995, 20000000) && playerLevel[1] == 100) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 20000000); addItem(1111, 1); sendMessage("You get a skillcape!"); } else { sendMessage("need gp and lvl idiots"); }

if you type ::strcape it works but if you type like ::pickup 0995 10

it will say need gp and lvls idiot… on any command thats not that one

any help?

Read full topic

item.title: DeleteItem on command
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 20000000)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 20000000); addItem(itemID, amount); sendMessage("You get a skillcape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 20m to get a skillcape!"); Just put the skillcape ID to the addItem part and the amount and put that in a command.

Read full topic
